title.rendered: New Logo for Smoothie King by WD Partners

content.rendered: (Est. 1973) “Smoothie King offers guests the original nutritional fresh-blended smoothie and healthy retail products, including sports beverages, energy bars, healthy snacks, vitamin supplements, herbs, minerals and other sports nutrition products. Smoothie King opened its first store in 1973 and started as the first franchised smoothie bar/health food store in the United States in 1989. Smoothie King currently has approximately 650 units operating in 32 states, the Caymans, the Republic of Korea and Singapore. In 2012, Smoothie King was ranked no. 1 by Entrepreneur magazine in the juice bar category for the 19th year; number 104 overall on the 2013 Franchise 500 list, and number 21 on the QSR Global 30 list.
